Works

Piermont Retreat - Static website built with Jekyll to be easily updatable by the developers as a static site. Fully responsive with custom-made unique grid. For footer local report, implemented Google MAP API timezone data to calculate current time in Tasmania including day-light saving and implemented Yahoo weather API for current weather. Elegant fade-in effect when users scroll down.
